Room.Name: Cellar of Tragirsha
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a damp and dark cellar, with an odd smell in the musty air.
Room.LongDescription: Tragirsha has lived here alone for almost 180 years, suffering from the spell of the demon. She waits for someone to break the curse cast on her, and has vowed to reward anyone who does. During the years she has lived here she has learned much because of her power to listen to the thoughts of people who pass by on the road outside.
